name: INVADERS WAR
description:
INVADERS WAR is a small project. If you haven't got Internet now, this game is for you!

In this game you will try to kill lots of aliens as you can! You can compete with your friends. 

There are two types of evils:

- Small UFO (small aliens spaceship, that appears every 15 seconds)

- Rare UFO (big spaceship, that moves very fast. It's can appear) 

My record is 34, can you break it?

Thanks everyone who played my game!
